award_title: Neutron Beta Decay Measurements for High Sensitivity Tests of the Standard Model of Particle Physics
subject: Reducing the friction on sharing code and analysis tools
body:
Hi Dr. Young,

I know you're heading into winter break soon—hope you get some actual downtime.

I'm reaching out because between Nab's waveform analysis, machine learning work, and UCNτ+ simulations, you're likely already fielding requests for code, digging up old scripts, and answering the same technical questions multiple times.

Ouro helps researchers share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable and durable, rather than a zip file buried in supplementary materials. It consolidates that work into a single endpoint so it's accessible without the back-and-forth.

Happy to get your group a look if it's helpful.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
